problem.markdown:
For water or steam lying in __________ region at a given temperature, the pressure is less than p[mathjaxinline]_{sat}[/mathjaxinline](T)
( ) Subcooled (x) Superheated ( ) Supercritical ( ) Liquid + Vapour
problem.p: For water or steam lying in __________ region at a given temperature, the pressure is less than p[mathjaxinline]_{sat}[/mathjaxinline](T)
